Topic.Title: How to edit a published game?

Posts.EditableText: I have a published quest game and I cannot figure out how to edit it although it is published! I can only figure out how to change the title and the description. Thank you!
Posts.HTML: I have a published quest game and I cannot figure out how to edit it although it is published! I can only figure out how to change the title and the description. Thank you!

Posts.EditableText:
If online version:
Um... you edit it, then publish it...

If offline version:
Edit the file you have, then go to your games, look there, and... beats me, I'm just guessing.
Posts.HTML:
If online version:
Um... you edit it, then publish it...

If offline version:
Edit the file you have, then go to your games, look there, and... beats me, I'm just guessing.

Posts.EditableText: Offline you have to upload the new file over the old one.
Posts.HTML: Offline you have to upload the new file over the old one.
